metadata.title: CVE-2018-13845 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue has been found in HTSlib 1.8. It is a buffer over-read in sam_parse1 in sam.c. It was discovered that HTSlib incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: htslib package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9-2').
